Articles.Content:
I have data to send back to mission control from a mystery goo experiment in a mun transfer orbit.

I'm running Remote Tech and I have a connection to Mission control and two geostat satellites as relays. Trouble is, I get the usual warning about making the pod unusable but when I press the transmit button, nothing happens.

Am I missing something or am I looking at a bug in my installation?

Cheers
Absolutley, got caught out by that before.
Can you post a few screenshots of your craft? Also, what antenna are you using?

Solved: I restarted KSP this morning and it allowed me to transmit the data. I'm figuring that something got screwed up in memory.

Thanks to responders.

I had the same occur to me. Had full electricity power, etc. The only thing I could figure out was that I was on the dark side of the Kun when it kept occurring. I waited until I could see Kermin while in the dark side

and the problem was gone.
